content:
95 
 
     (i) ABU does not accept a combination of Local 
Languages and Religious Studies.    
(ii) BSU and UNN require at least a pass in 
Mathematics.    
(iii) COOU, ESUTECH and UNIZIK require ‘O’ level 
credit passes to include Mathematics.    
(iv) EBSU – Same as in Accountancy.    
(v) NASARAWA accepts two 'A' level or IJMB 
passes chosen from Accounts, Business 
Management, Government and Statistics; NCE 
Government or ND Public Administration with 
merit/lower credit.    
(vi) OAU requires English Language, Mathematics, 
Government,  Economics,  History 
 and  
Geography.    
(vii) UNN requires minimum entry requirements 
plus ‘O’ level credit passes in English Language, 
Government or History and  
Mathematics.    
(viii) CARITAS requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes 
to include English Language,  
Economics, Government, History, Accounting, 
Business Management and a pass in  
Mathematics or Further Mathematics.  
  
UTME SUBJECTS    
(i) ABU accepts History In lieu of Government.  
(ii) EBSU requires Economics and any other Social 
Science subject.   
(iii) OAU  requires  Mathematics, 
 Economics, Government.   
(iv) SALEM requires Government, Economics and 
any Social Science subject.    
COURSE/  
DEGREE AWARDING  
INSTITUTIONS  
 REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY   UTME
